verses.verse: When <S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H2859>father-in-law,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and for <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had brought Israel <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478><s%> of <S%H4480>Egypt;<s%> <S%H4714><s%>

Then <S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H2859>father-in-law,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6855>Zipporah,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he had sent her <S%H7964>back,<s%>

And her <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons;<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H1648>Gershom;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H1961>been<s%> an <S%H1616>alien<s%> in a <S%H5237>strange<s%> land: <S%H776><s%>

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>other<s%> was <S%H461>Eliezer;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father,<s%> said he, was mine <S%H5828>help,<s%> and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H4480>sword<s%> <S%H2719><s%> of Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%>

And <S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H2859>father-in-law,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of God: <S%H430><s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> thy <S%H2859>father-in-law<s%> <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> am <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, and thy <S%H802>wife,<s%> and her <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> her.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in-law,<s%> and did <S%H7812>obeisance,<s%> and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him; and they <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H7453>other<s%> of their <S%H7965>welfare;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H168>tent.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in-law<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and to the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> <S%H182>sake,<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8513>travail<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> had come <S%H4672>upon<s%> them by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and how the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them.

And <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> <S%H2302>rejoiced<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H5337>delivered<s%> out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

And <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> hath <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> hath <S%H5337>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H1419>greater<s%> than <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H430>gods:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they dealt <S%H2102>proudly<s%> he was <S%H5921>above<s%> them.

And <S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H2859>father-in-law,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> for <S%H430>God:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H2859>father-in-law<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H4480>morrow,<s%> <S%H4283><s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

And when <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H2859>father-in-law<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H6213>doest<s%> to the <S%H5971>people?<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> <S%H3427>sittest<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> thyself <S%H905>alone,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5324>stand<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> thee <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H6153>even?<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H2859>father-in-law,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of God: <S%H430><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H1697>matter,<s%> they <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me; and I <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> and <S%H7453>another,<s%> and I do make them <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and his <S%H8451>laws.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H2859>father-in-law<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, The <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H6213>doest<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>

Thou wilt surely wear <S%H5034>away,<s%> <S%H5034><s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5973>with<s%> thee: <S%H3588>for<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> is too <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> thee; thou art <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H6213>perform<s%> it thyself <S%H905>alone.<s%>

Hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> unto my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> I will give thee <S%H3289>counsel,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee: <S%H1961>Be<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H4136>Godward,<s%> <S%H430><s%> that <S%H859>thou<s%> mayest <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>causes<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> God: <S%H430><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H2094>teach<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> <S%H2706>ordinances<s%> and <S%H8451>laws,<s%> and shalt <S%H3045>show<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> wherein they must <S%H1980>walk,<s%> and the <S%H4640>work<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they must <S%H6213>do.<s%>

Moreover <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H2372>provide<s%> out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> such as <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H571>truth,<s%> <S%H8130>hating<s%> <S%H1215>covetousness;<s%> and <S%H7760>place<s%> such <S%H5921>over<s%> them, to be <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H2572>fifties,<s%> and <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of tens: <S%H6235><s%>

And let them <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>seasons:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%> they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, but <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H8199>judge:<s%> so shall it be <S%H7043>easier<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thyself, and they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the burden <S%H854>with<s%> thee.

If <S%H518><s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee so, then thou shalt be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5975>endure,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> their <S%H4725>place<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H2859>father-in-law,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had <S%H559>said.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H7218>heads<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H505>thousands,<s%> <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H2572>fifties,<s%> and <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H6235>tens.<s%>

And they <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>seasons:<s%> the <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1697>causes<s%> they <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> but <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%> they <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H1992>themselves.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H853>let<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in-law<s%> <S%H7971>depart;<s%> and he went his <S%H1980>way<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his own <S%H776>land.<s%>
